response.answer_text: The snapdragon 730G is capable of supporting upto 4G LTE standards. It doesn't support 5G. The chipsets supporting 5G are snapdragon 865,snapdragon 855 if the seperate modem is used by the manufacturer, snapdragon 765,mediatek’s dimensity series, exynos 990 series and hi silicon kirin 990 5G  Hope you found this helpful. Upvote if you loved it. Cheers

The Snapdragon X15 LTE Modem offers remarkable LTE download and upload speeds in addition to breakthrough Wi-Fi performance. In fact, the Snapdragon 730G is one of our first platforms that comes Wi-Fi 6-ready. And it doesn’t support 5G.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Kumar Ramayanam Mangalam
